_comment: PII deny-list for fixture and golden-result files. Patterns are Python regexes. Add new patterns here when real data is discovered. Run scripts/dev/sanitize_fixtures.py to apply replacements after updating this file.

patterns.description: Public IPv4 address. Excludes RFC-1918 private ranges (10.x, 192.168.x, 172.16-31.x), loopback (127.x), and 0.0.0.0.
